  • Action

Class Action

brief

Base class for all actions. Note that it is not mandatory to use this class to define an action (see ActionPool.execute())

see

ActionPool

Hierarchy

  • Action
    • FunctionAction
    • MacroAction
    • MoveNodeAction
    • FillHoleAction

  • Generator of rectangular and elliptical surfaces
